title: La Peau et les Os = Skin and Bone
description: While in prison, Jacques encounters the hostility of the other inmates who suspect him to be a snitch. A sudden reversal of situation gives him an opportunity to acquire both prestige and the trust of his companions. Ather this incident, inmates band together to help prove his innocence. Jacques finds himself free, without knowing to whom he owns his freedom. Awards: Prix Jean Vigo 1961.  Credits: Producers, Rene Bezard, Rene Thevenet; director, Jean-Paul Sassy ; writers, Jacques Panijel, Jean-Paul Sassy ; photography, Georges Leclerc ; music, Louiguy ; art direction, Sydney Bettex. Cast: Gerard Blain, Juliette Mayniel, Andre Oumansky, Rene Dary, Julien Verdier, Etienne Bierry.
